description: Tool to decrypt/write in the dragon language. The draconic language is the language of the dragons, it exists many variants, one of these has been popularized in the Skyrim video game.

questions.answer: The language of the dragons uses an alphabet of 36 symbols. These characters allow to code the letters of the Latin alphabet (A-Z) but also some combinations such as AA, AH, EI, EY, II, IR, OO. Some symbols like , normally the equivalent of C are not used in any word known in draconic language. Encryption uses a substitution of letters and / or letter pair by draconic symbols.
